Literature.Title: Novel phenol-soluble modulin derivatives in community-associated methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus identified through imaging mass spectrometry.
Literature.Author: Gonzalez DJ, Okumura CY, Hollands A, Kersten R, Akong-Moore K, Pence MA, Malone CL, Derieux J, Moore BS, Horswill AR, Dixon JE, Dorrestein PC, Nizet V

Literature.Title: Phenol-Soluble-Modulin-Inspired Amphipathic Peptides Have Bactericidal Activity against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zeng P, Xu C, Cheng Q, Liu J, Gao W, Yang X, Wong KY, Chen S, Chan KF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=>64µM),Streptococcus group A serotype M3 4041-05(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=>128µM)
